author: Microsoft
description:
UN Climate Change is partnering with Microsoft to build the Climate Data Hub—an AI-powered platform that makes climate data from more than 190 countries transparent, accessible, and actionable for policymakers, researchers, and communities worldwide.

Learn more: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/nonprofits

Subscribe to Microsoft on YouTube here: https://aka.ms/SubscribeToYouTube

For more about Microsoft, our technology, and our mission, visit https://aka.ms/microsoftstories
title: UN Climate Change partners with Microsoft to create Climate Data Hub
